About Royale Concorde International School Group

In 2005, Sri L R Shivarame Gowda envisioned Royale Concorde International School (RCIS) as a bold, co-educational institution with an international perspective. Aligned with the Central Board of Secondary Education, New Delhi, Royale Concorde International School offers a comprehensive academic journey from Pre-Primary to Senior Secondary levels, featuring Science and Computer Science courses at the Senior Secondary level, with forthcoming plans to introduce Arts and Commerce Streams.

Royale Concorde International School transcends the conventional notion of an international school; it serves as a dynamic crucible where students are not only encouraged to learn, but to ignite their intellectual curiosity, embrace self-expression, and unleash their creative potential. We recognize the paramount importance of nurturing these qualities in children, as they form the bedrock of self-esteem and imbue students with the unwavering confidence necessary to triumph over life’s challenges.
